Comment.Language: For Saturdays and Sundays of the Great Fast:

Text.Language: ern/cteuin e~h~r/i e~jwn n~h~me n~e~hoou nem h~me n~e~jwrh: sa n~tefcotten qen nennobi: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
fasted for us forty days and forty nights to save us from our sins. Save us and have mercy on us.
